website_summaries.verdict: If you need a good grip to protect your Nintendo Switch in portable mode, this is a practical choice that comes with a self-standing prop.
pros: Made from a hard yet flexible and durable material
Case comes off easily if needed
Doesn't cover any buttons on the Nintendo Switch
Sturdy enough to take a drop
Smaller grips on the back, make it easy to take on the go, but still more comfortable than using the Nintendo Switch without a grip
cons: This model will have to be removed in order to let you place your Nintendo Switch in a dock

website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable TPU case that removes easily for docking.
pros: This thin and ergonomically-shaped case cover allows access to all buttons and ports, including the kickstand
People who prefer portable play will find the design comfortable and convenient, while players who use the Switch with their TV regularly will appreciate the ease of removal
cons: Some customers wish the molded grips were larger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Don't buy any other brand.
customer_reviews.text: Sure, it's my first day of use, but slipping this puppy on my Switch instantly made my day. It's thick enough for protection, yet it doesn't add bulk. Most importantly, it makes holding the Switch so much more comfortable. It's cheaper than the competition, but it seems like it's better than the competition: it comes in a nice box, feels like good quality, and it doesn't cover up any buttons--not even the shoulder buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: The Orzly Grip Case is incredibly comfortable in my grip when playing, it's easy to put on and take off. The ergonomic design is incredibly well done. I haven't tried the other cases for the Switch, but I would highly recommend this one as you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: MayaAndLuke

customer_reviews.title: Well made and comfortable rubber grip for Nintendo Switch
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I am happy with this grip case. It's well made rubber that feels good to hold. The Switch is clearly secure in the case and the thicker grips do make it more comfortable to use. I've had issues with my carpal tunnel in Handheld Mode and that seems to have gone away when using this case. My only knock against it is that it's a little difficult to take on and off the Switch. I go between Handheld and TV mode quite a bit and each time I take off the case, I can feel the Joycon bending in their spots and I'm worried I might break them at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Derreck

customer_reviews.title: Makes the Switch feel comfortable and solid in my hands!
customer_reviews.text: This product makes the Switch suitable for handheld use. Prior to getting it, I hated using my Switch this way. It always felt slippery, and the controls flexed, making it feel insecure in my hands. With this case in place, the Switch feels solid and comfortable. I now am doing most of my gaming in handheld mode, and really enjoy it. The only downside, is that it takes some care to remove it. But I have a USB c cable that I’m using for charging, so only need to remove it when I use it with the dock. Great product, and totally changes how the Switch feels in my hands.
customer_reviews.author: B. Alter

customer_reviews.title: Great small grips that fits in Orzly case
customer_reviews.text: It arrived faster than expected from London to the US. It maybe took a week and a half. It feels pretty sturdy. It looks just like the photos. The grips are small, so it's good for small hands. It feels comfortable in my hands. However, it's not easy to take off. I would recommend getting this if you dont take your controllers off often. It's also see through in case you want to show off your skin. It ALSO fits in the Orzly case that is sold separately on Amazon if you have it! Overall, I am satisfied with the product.

customer_reviews.title: Very ergonomic
customer_reviews.text: It's fits on your Switch like a glove, but maybe a little too good? See, I feel like I'm going to break off the joycons trying to slip this grip on, the fit is so tight the the things is so sturdy. Once it's on though it transforms the hand held experience of the Switch all for the better. Having that little bit of extra grip helps you game for a little bit longer and harder with better accuracy with the thumb sticks (at least in my humble opinion).
customer_reviews.author: MadimusMaximus

customer_reviews.title: A necessity for handheld mode
customer_reviews.text: I bought myself a Nintendo Switch, and my kids a Lite, because I wAnTeD tHe biG oNe. It’s so heavy and awkward to use in handheld mode. This case helps one of those problems. It’s not mountable, but it’s super easy to take on and off, and also helps protect the device while it’s on. Between extra storage, games, and cases.. I hate how much extra money I’ve had to spend on the Switch, but I’d definitely recommend this grip case to make it easier/more comfortable to hold if nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable to hold and provides good protection. Can be difficult to remove though.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the feel of this grip and it makes the Switch much more comfortable to hold for longer gaming sessions on the go. The Switch is very thin and I have large hands that tend to cramp when holding the Switch. This case helps by adding a thicker portion on the sides to more emulate the feel of a controller. It is a great case. My only complaint, and why it loses a star, is because it can be difficult to get the case off when I need to dock it or detach the joycons.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great Grip Case, wish I had it months ago!
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I got my Switch, I have never really like using it in hand-held mode. However this grip case has changed that, wish I would have looked into grip cases sooner. Really like this product, I got the 'Smoke' color option. The only minor complaint is that there are times I like to use the Switch in dock mode. Taking off this case does require some effort, which makes sense because it is one piece and you want the case to fit good when it is on. My solution (so far) has been to go with a USB-C dongle with and HDMI output.
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: not easy to take on/off
customer_reviews.text: I can't give this a negative review because it does fit well, and it does work well. However, it is NOT very easy to take on and off for docking. I felt like I put unneeded stress on the joy cons trying to pry the case off and didn't want to damage my device. if you always play in handheld mode, this is a fine option as it does fit well. If you think you will remove it often look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Washam

customer_reviews.title: Love this case
customer_reviews.text: I was getting hand cramps from long sessions while handheld. I decided to give this case a shot and I’m in love. Hand cramps are gone, and the switch feels more sturdy overall. Easy enough to get off when you throw it on the stock dock. Charger cables and buttons are protected but still easy to get to.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Carter

customer_reviews.title: Close but not quite perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this was going to fit more snug than it does. The right side is definitely looser because when gripping the case it moves around. Cutouts on the case do line up with all the ports and the kickstand is useable. I love the idea and it has a lot of potential to be perfect, but if it just wasn't loose, I would use it more. I'm still shopping for a replacement, so until then it is protecting my switch.
customer_reviews.author: Aiden

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable for me.
customer_reviews.text: Used it on my switch for about a day. It fits well, isn't too hard to put on or take off, and leaves all the buttons , ports, and other doo-dads pretty usable. The shoulder buttons are still usable, but it takes a little getting used to. In my opinion it doesn't make holding the switch as a handheld any more comfortable, so I returned it. I'm not saying it won't work for you, but it didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: No More Hand Cramps
customer_reviews.text: the Nintendo Switch is not a fun system to play no matter how many games u got if u got big hands like me the switch is just downright uncomfortable. this TPU style case (like a phone case) protects your Switch, adds grip on the bottom and generally it's easier to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Shane S.

customer_reviews.title: Much needed grip
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! The switch can be a bit uncomfortable to hold for any long period of time due to how thin it is. Well here’s your fix, at a reasonable price. The grip goes on effortlessly, and gives the switch that much needed grip without making it heavy/bulky or covering up any of the ports. A definite buy if you need that extra bit of grip.
customer_reviews.author: King of Sting

customer_reviews.title: A case that works
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size! I've bought 4 different cases from Amazon and one off ebay. This was the one that closely matched the wii u. The texture was close to the shell I have on my wii u controller. The fit was snug and the switch felt secure. The organizer case I bought from Orzly also fits this unit. Well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Swizeltwirlz0002

customer_reviews.title: Good Job👍
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the smoked variant and man...blended in perfectly with the System. I’m really picky on game cases; the look & functionality of the product is A1. Good Job👍
customer_reviews.author: Eric Tubbs

customer_reviews.title: Makes a world of difference, ergonomically, compared to the standard handheld setup.
customer_reviews.text: Fits very snugly, while also being easy to remove. Considering the low price, this product is a no-brainer if you use your Switch in handheld mode regularly, it really does make a massive difference in comfort levels, while button accessibility is not compromised in the slightest. I'll echo others reviews by stating that the grips at the back could be a touch bigger to mimic a pro controller a bit more closely, but that aside, I have no regrets whatsoever with my purchase. It makes handheld gaming cramp-free, and therefore more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great grip case!
customer_reviews.text: I love my switch even more with this grip case. Its a perfect fit and it makes holding the switch so much more comfortable in your hands bc of the grips. Without the case it felt like the switch was too fragile and unnatural holding. Would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Tina S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy game playing case
customer_reviews.text: Perfect case. Great quality and I like how the case is semi transparent (Smokey Gray). My husband has one as well. We both are happy with our purchases. Makes game playing enjoyable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amy van Arkel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Really helps having handles - your wrists will thank you. Super easy to remove/clean, but sturdy enough to protect your switch.
customer_reviews.author: Vera Mason

customer_reviews.title: Good, but NOT Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The case is amazing. It protects against light / medium falls and adds great grip support for the handheld option for the switch. But..... there is a small issue. It is not dockable.... on top of this it is slightly annoying / time consuming to take off and put on every time you want to dock. So if you play handheld a LOT, this is worth it, otherwise be cautious! Again, great product for handheld, but not "switch" friendly. 4/5
customer_reviews.author: Ryan CUmmings

customer_reviews.title: Damn good for price
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty nice case. Fits great. The only thing is it's kinda hard to take off to dock or to use joy cons. Would recommend using a stand and different joycons if you want to use on the tv still. But on the go, this case feels safe. Update. I wish the case didn't block the L & R button as much. Other than that. It's awesome. Use handheld more then docked.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton

customer_reviews.title: It feels more like a controller with the case on
customer_reviews.text: It could be a little bigger, but I have large hands and it still works well. It feels more like a controller with the case on. There is a spot on the upper right of the case that doesn't fit properly; however, it doesn't really affect anything.
customer_reviews.author: Speedy Andy

customer_reviews.title: The case works well after some modifications
customer_reviews.text: I had to cut a section out above both joycons to allow the case to be removed easier. Before I did that, the l or r button (I can’t remember which) unseated some when I was removing the switch from this case. Fortunately the button just snapped back into place.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Good case
customer_reviews.text: Putting it on is pretty simple but taking it off is a gamble of stretching the case or accidentally dropping the switch. It does feel comfortable to hold & is a perfect fit for the Orzly carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Grimz

customer_reviews.title: Good case
customer_reviews.text: Gotta say I really like this case. It’s not hard but a balance of soft and squishy while maintaining its form. I don’t write many reviews but I was really impressed by this case. It is a touch on the bulky side but fits my case just so with a bit of effort. It’s snug but I don’t mind. Great job on the case.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny and John

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I never dock my Switch since I bring it with me to work or I have the tv. playing Netflix. I bought this just to try and make it feel a little more comfortable in my hands but I really didn't expect it to feel so perfect. It makes the weight perfect and the grip just adds more to the comfortability since I have something to rest my fingers on. Absolutely worth buying I promise you.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Orzly does some good stuff. I've had the screen protector for a while and this case fits perfectly and it's extremely comfortable, best thing is that it is the cheapest case out there. Keep in mind that you can't dock the console.
customer_reviews.author: Pepe Silva

customer_reviews.title: Good grip
customer_reviews.text: Works well, feels better in the hand than without the case. Case isn’t hard to put in and take off, but it isn’t easy.
customer_reviews.author: Rhino

customer_reviews.title: GAME CHANGER
customer_reviews.text: My hands were hurting so bad, stiff in the knuckles area because the Switch is a pain to hold. This grip is easy to take off and put on, feels GREAT and has relieved the pain from my knuckles entirely. Does not dock with grip.
customer_reviews.author: Israel C.

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: You need this for hand held play, period! It makes such a huge difference in terms of actually getting a comfortable hold on your Switch. I thought my Switch wouldn’t fit with it on in a case I also purchased on Amazon but it did so that is a major plus. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality comfortable grip case
customer_reviews.text: The only negative is I didn’t buy this sooner. Drastically improves the comfort of handheld mode, adds good protection, easily put on and off, and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect case for my switch and of high quality material! The case also provides a much more conformable grip.
customer_reviews.author: CHC

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cheap
customer_reviews.text: I thought the switch was a little too thin for longer sessions of play. I've used this product for a few days and feel like it was money well spent. It's easy to put on and take off without tearing. I definitely recommend this product especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tdc1213

customer_reviews.title: It’s a life changer!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this grip case for the Nintendo switch! It makes it easier to hold the device and play for long gaming sessions. I use to get hand cramps without this grip case but ever since I bought this it’s been a life changer when I play on my switch!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Sleeve fits perfectly and is easy to get on and off
customer_reviews.text: Sleeve fits perfectly and is easy to get on and off. My only complaint is that it doesn't fir in the dock with the sleeve on but that's not much of an issue since I bought the sleeve for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Kidder

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grip case
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product well made and feels well made and comfortable, easy to take off too,
customer_reviews.author: rattyny

customer_reviews.title: These products are great and especially solid and well made for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have the Orzly travel case and now the grip case. These products are great and especially solid and well made for the price. I don't travel a ton with my Switch, but these products are going to come in handy when I do. Will definitely consider buying any Orzly products I might need in the future.
customer_reviews.author: J. D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Nintendo Switch Accessory
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Nintendo Switch Accessory. I will be giving a detailed review of this product for my subscribers on my youtube channel 'OpinionsCount'
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Good grip for handheld play.
customer_reviews.text: I recently switched from another hand grip for my switch case to this one. I do like the cloudy grey tone on it, making the back logo visible. It's rather tough (sometimes) to get out of the case to charge it. Wish there was a little more padding on the grips.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Monarch

customer_reviews.title: Good for small hands
customer_reviews.text: I really like the feel of the grips. I found it to be easy to put on and remove, you just need to be mindful of the buttons, but it's not difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great around my Switch, very comfortable to hold. Seems like it would provide good protection.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Linscheid

customer_reviews.title: If you have a switch you need those grip. ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have a switch you need those grip. Makes it easier to play for any amount of time. I have carple tunnel and it eases up the fatigue I feel.
customer_reviews.author: J. G.

customer_reviews.title: Great protective case
customer_reviews.text: Great protection for the system itself and fast shipping. Easy for me to take on and off but not my kid which is ok with me.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: really helps my hands playing the Switch
customer_reviews.text: I could not play the switch in handheld mode for more than an hour without getting hand cramps. this lets me play for a long time and feel nothing. its a bit hard to pop in and out, but that's to be expected honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great for Switch users
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good cover/grips. Great at reducing wrist fatigue. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Trent Swearengen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: like how slim it is and it actually alot more comfortable than holding the switch by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Ramcharan

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, but there's better ones out there!
customer_reviews.text: This makes holding the console much more comfortable but it's pretty annoying that you have to remove it in order to dock it. Will keep as backup, but I opted for another grip case (that fits into both a carrying case AND the dock)
customer_reviews.author: jean

customer_reviews.title: Best grip case I have used
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and take off. The grips make the Switch comfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.author: d0gg

customer_reviews.title: Good comfort, difficult to remove.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Slate Grey cover to use the Switch in portable mode. I like the comfort that the case offers, but it feels really difficult to remove the case. As someone who uses the Switch both portable and docked, I'm worried repeatedly taking on/off the case will damage the switch. Will be returning the item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Really easy tu grab my nintendo switch now, I love this case, quialty is really good too.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Lugo

customer_reviews.title: Better, but not great
customer_reviews.text: Eh. It's a bit more comfortable than plain joy-cons, and it fits in the Orzly case. Otherwise it's still a bit awkward to hold, and partially blocks the Z buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Augustine

customer_reviews.title: Flexible plastic buy it worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice , sturdy,and it looks sleek.i would definitely recommend this for those who like to play on the go a lot . Just a heads up does not fit in the dock with the case on and you cannot remove the joycons with the case on. But the case is awesome 👏 😎
customer_reviews.author: jaime herrera

customer_reviews.title: Best option
customer_reviews.text: Really confortable grip. I’ve tried other grips, but this is the best option. The package arrive on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong , or...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good case feels great , only down side is continuous in n out will wear hinges on joycons
customer_reviews.author: juan gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Feels great in your hand. Can take a little effort to get out of the case to use on the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Steve W

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this to make handheld mode more comfortable and the product succeeds in that regard
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to make handheld mode more comfortable and the product succeeds in that regard. Unfortunately I do not like the rubbery texture of the material. With this case the switch is awkward to hold instead of painful. I wish the case was actually bulkier and replicated the feeling of a traditional controller on the backside of the joy cons. UPDATE Orzly reached out and offered me a replacement with a larger grip that might better suit my needs. Replacement is still pending but A+ on customer service. I will revise this when the replacement comes in.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mills

customer_reviews.title: Highly and strongly recommend this product to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Honestly a MUST have for any Nintendo switch! Don’t know how I lived without it! Highly and strongly recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: The grip is easy to hold and feels nice in the hands but maybe not too comfortable with people who have larger hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t Switch with out it
customer_reviews.text: Very excellent, didn't know how despertly I need it. Since using it i rarly took it off. It is an excellent product and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Yazeed alshobaili

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, first thing out of the box I was properly applying it to my switch and.... CRACK. It cracks. So much for protective case
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Great case, great quality of material
customer_reviews.text: Great case, great quality of material. Fits well. potentially could reduce thermal performance, and is prone to fingerprint marks,, still very happy with it and will give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Breig

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This has made playing undocked so much better! Makes playing for an extended time very possible. Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: daniel morlock

customer_reviews.title: Good Grip Case but a pain to take off
customer_reviews.text: I like how it feels. But taking it off feels like I might snap my Switch in half.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon A. Jaquez

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable grip
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Comfortable. WARNING: You have to remove it when in docked mode
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for most. Wish it was bulkier for bigger hands
customer_reviews.text: Good case, though not as impressed with it as I had hoped. The bumps for grip weren’t as pronounced as I had hopped they would be.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and the most affordable one out there!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice grip case, orzly I cannot stress it enough. This case is amazing but I hope you guys make one with bigger grips and the ability to dock, aside from that it is of very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to install and very comfortable! No more uncomfortable gaming sessions on my Switch.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Loved this case. Fits perfect and fits into a traveler's case.
customer_reviews.author: andrea mullins

customer_reviews.title: The best grip case for the Switch!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fitting, quality grip case for the Switch. I got it in the smoked gray and it also looks really good. All the cutouts line up perfectly and the buttons, ports, and vents are easily accessible. You can also still use the stand with the case on, and the built-in grips actually help keep the system from tipping over as easily. The added grip also helps prevent hand cramps and makes the Switch feel so much better for extended play sessions. While it can't be docked with the case on, it's very quick and easy to take on and off. The packaging is even nice looking. I highly recommend this grip case!
customer_reviews.author: Chad S.

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: A must have on the switch when your on tablet mode!!! Super comfy , exellent product
customer_reviews.author: adanzx3

customer_reviews.title: Good for really small hands, thin TPU plastic
customer_reviews.text: This is for adult small or extra small sized hands. I don't have huge hands, adult large in gloves. The ergonomic supports are way to small to even register a difference in comfort. The TPU material is rather thin too.
customer_reviews.author: Thakur

customer_reviews.title: Well made and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Case is well made, sturdy and comfortable. Makes playing in portable mode a lot better IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Sumpter

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall good and surprised that it came in a fancy box being 7.49 the switch still feels a little to small but this case/grip is a big improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Better hope you never need to take it off again
customer_reviews.text: Better hope you never need to take it off again, cause it will take a joycon and the connection rail with it. It fits very snug and you have to REALLY pry it to get it off. It ended up snapping one of my joycons off when it finally did come off (I had to basically peel the corner off and push the switch out like a pill). I'm sure it's a great grip, but I can no longer use it. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S.

customer_reviews.title: Still uncomfortable for large hands.
customer_reviews.text: Quality materials but the padding behind the joy cons needs to be thicker to fit my hands well. This combined with the fact that the case needs to be removed for the switch to be docked makes it not worthwhile to me.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: It felt like I was going to break my switch trying to ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits very tight and the material it's made of isn't very elastic. It felt like I was going to break my switch trying to remove it. Returned it. If you never plan on removing it, it felt great in my hands, but it can't be docked with it on and you can't remove the joycons either.
customer_reviews.author: Tim W. Stafford

product_meta.title: Orzly Comfort Grip Case for Nintendo Switch - Protective Back Cover for use on The Nintendo Switch Console in Handheld Gamepad Mode with Built in Comfort Padded Hand Grips - Smokey Slate
product_meta.description:
ACCESS TO PORTS, BUTTONS, AIR-VENTS, AND KICKSTAND:

This case is designed specifically for the Nintendo Switch, with specially placed cut-outs so that all features (except TV Docking and JoyCon removal) can be accessed without having to remove the caseThis case features built in padded handles at the back to make playing for long durations much more comfortable.

EASY TO REMOVE FOR DOCKING:

This case is made of a specially designed flexible TPU material which allows it to be easily taken off quickly whenever you need to dock.

DESIGNED FOR COMFORT:

This case features built in padded handles at the back to make playing for long durations much more comfortable.

PLEASE NOTE: THE NINTENDO SWITCH CONSOLE, CONTROLLERS, AND OTHER ACCESSORIES SHOWN IN IMAGES ARE FOR USAGE DEMONSTRATION PURPOSES ONLY AND ARE NOT INCLUDED WITH THIS GRIP CASE.

MORE ACCESSORIES AVAILABLE: To see other accessories for the Nintendo Switch Console in our range, simply search 'ORZLY SWITCH' in the Amazon search bar (above). 

TIP: While not all case accessories are inter-compatible, both our "Orzly Tempered Glass Screen Protectors"* and also our "Orzly Travel Case for Nintendo Switch"* are designed to be fully compatible with this Grip Case, and the three together make for a perfect set. (*each product is sold separately, and are not included). For our screen protectors, search "ORZLY SWITCH GLASS", and for our Orzly Travel Case search "ORZLY SWITCH ZIP" in the Amazon search bar above).
feature_bullets: DESIGNED FOR COMFORT: This case features built in padded handles at the back to make playing for long durations much more comfortable.
EASY TO REMOVE FOR DOCKING: This case is made of a specially designed flexible TPU material which allows it to be easily taken off quickly whenever you need to dock.
POUCH FRIENDLY: This Grip Case is also compatible with our "Orzly Travel Case for Nintendo Switch" (sold separately on amazon).

PORTS, BUTTONS, AIR-VENTS, AND KICKSTAND ACCESS: This case is designed specifically for the Nintendo Switch, with specially placed cut-outs so that all features (except TV Docking and JoyCon removal) can be accessed without having to remove the case.
MORE ACCESSORIES AVAILABLE: To see other accessories for the Nintendo Switch Console in our range, simply search 'ORZLY SWITCH' in the Amazon search bar (above).
